teaser: Friday is the deadline for students to accept the offers colleges made to them. So what do all these offers mean?
description: Friday is the deadline for students to accept the offers colleges made to them. So what do all these offers mean?
contentencoded:
Dateline:
Friday is the deadline for students to accept the offers colleges made to them.

MPR News' Kerri Miller talked with Susannah Snider, an expert on paying for college, about how to understand the financial aid component of picking a
title: How to decode college financial aid letters
